Entries.Mon2: I visited Emmett yesterday. He taught me a thing or two about mixing some drinks!#$b#The Saloon is my other part-time job, you see.$h
Entries.Wed4: I sometimes visit the town, It's really nice to learn a thing or two from Gus and Emmett.#$b#They're amazing people.$h

Entries.spring_23: I would love to collaborate with Emmett on a new Flower Dance dress design. Maybe something inspired by actual flowers?
Entries.Fri4: I'm going to go with Emmett next time he goes to the desert. Sandy really understands style, she's so fun to talk to.$h
Entries.Sun6: I think Haley and Emmett would find they have more in common than they thought if they were closer and talked more.#$b#I guess when you're around someone all the time, it's harder to see.

Entries.Thu4: I talked to Emmett the other day and he told me about the yoga classes he and Ysa are thinking about doing at the hotel.#$e#I might join them if I can find the time. Yoga is amazing for flexibility and core strength.$h

I talked to EmEmmettily the other day and he told me about the yoga classes he and Ysa are thinking about doing at the hotel.#$e#I might join them if I can find the time. Yoga is amazing for flexibility and core strength.$h

Entries.Clint: I wonder if Emmett would like to dance with me at the concert.$h#$e#I shouldn't bother asking, he'll probably say no.$s

Entries.Faye: I love what Emmett has done with the painted eggs! He has such a nice eye for color.

Entries.Ysabelle: I'm going to join Emmett on the dance floor soon.#$b#You should totally join us!$h

Entries.Jeric: My secret giver better not give me some low quality fabric and sewing materials.$s#$b#That's nice for Emmett and all, but I'm making high-class garments.

Entries.Ian: My gloves have holes in them. I'm not bothered by the cold, so it's not that big of a deal.#$e#I wonder if Emmett can teach me how to mend them.
